name: EMBER SKULL
description:
Wake up in the pit of ember and embark on an endless quest with no goal, murdering hundreds of monsters on your way!

CONTROLS: WASD to move, left mouse button to shoot, right mouse button to use your first subweapon, space to use your second subweapon.

Cover image and some extra art done by my friend: https://decapitato.newgrounds.com/

Note: browser version may experience performance issues because im a bad programmer, please download the desktop version below.
